txt.en: 'Please, help me escape from these horrible spiders! I was gathering herbs and didn't notice them stalking me. I've been trapped here for days!'
'Thank you, [placeholder]! Let us leave this place!'
You found Bersi of Gondamon who went to gather herbs near a spider-lair and found himself trapped.
Escort Bersi out of the spider-lair, defending him from the spiders.
Protect Bersi as you escort him out of the spider-lair
